Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FourDReconstruction::FourDReconstruction (   ) 
 

the constructor is to read the concentration profile from file, generate lambda matrix, and distribute to processors

Parameters:
in_file: file name of the kinetics file
status: information regarding number of processors and current processors
scanStartTime: start time of the scan
frameStartTime: time between the start of the scan and the start of the frame
requestedDuration: requested duration of time frame
